alert.note: Alert for Malheur (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 13 at 3:15PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM MDT/630 PM PDT/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Dry washes and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Idaho and southeast Oregon, including the following counties, in southwest Idaho, Owyhee. In southeast Oregon, Malheur. * WHEN...Until 730 PM MDT /630 PM PDT/. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams and normally dry arroyos. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 413 PM MDT /313 PM PDT/, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause dry washes and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Jordan Valley, Rockville School, Malloy Ranch, Rockville, Succor Creek Campground, Leslie Gulch, Slocum Creek Campground, Sheaville, and southern Owyhee Reservoir. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
